sentence: Service attentive plus the weather was on our side
On arrival we were seated in the large reception area and offered complimentary Singapore Slings we were dealt with quickly and efficiently by one of the best service people that I have met
Old world charm and warmth of your team members
The pool service was great and we were well looked after
Everything about the hotel is wonderful the staff the ambience our lovely room the food and of course the Singapore Sling
The staff and their standard of service were remarkable
Extremely strong customer service a magical feel to the place but whilst rooms are pleasant they are indeed in need of an upgrade
All staff encountered were friendly professional and helpful
The staff were attentive courteous and thoroughly professional
Now from the moment we arrived and taken to our room on the third floor we were looked after impeccably with the most perfect service
One of the staff members while sweeping peanut shells off the floor told me that the bar closed at 11 pm
Despite all confirmed for a butler to attend my suite from 130pm to check out for an arranged limousine transfer at 145pm I waited until 140pm with still no contact from any staff
Service too in the Tiffin Room was excellent particularly from Ryan as previously mentioned
Fortunately the limousine was on standby and I was not in a mad rush to catch my flightSuch a shame as excellent service was also experienced
The service is in need of improvement from the check in to the room butler maid service restaurant service hit ur miss to no hot water for 3 days

I did feel that the check in staff though friendly and efficient were too few and thus frequently tied up having to handle other requests on the phone or even other in person interactions with other guests
This place has been closed for ages and opened with opened with the same old staff who love to cater to old retired looking Europeans and old repeat guests who have been their many times
Pool bar service under served
When you do enter the door staff members will challenge you with questions trying to ascertain whether you are a guest or not “ Sir how can I help you ”
Generally we found the staff not very knowledgeable of the level of service to give in this hotel
